name: washing_startCourse
description: This function is used to start the washing process of the washing machine on a specific course.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device which needs to be turned on is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device which needs to be turned on is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The device on which action needs to be performed.

parameters.name: compartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment of the device, in which action needs to be performed.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The mode in which device needs to be set.
